comment.body:
我不確定要說中文還是機翻成英文，所以請讓我先用中文
目前我已試過的規則如下：
||mangaapi.manhuaren.com^$script
||mangaapi.manhuaren.com^$object
mangaapi.manhuaren.com##script
mangaapi.manhuaren.com##object
但是並沒有作用，而其他的如：
||mangaapi.manhuaren.com^$third-party
||mangaapi.manhuaren.com^$other
||mangaapi.manhuaren.com^$～object
則是不能連上網頁？，上面圖1的部分會出現錯誤

關於app的補充，與之前的#21078是相同的
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/21078#issuecomment-412828928

但是可以阻擋廣告，卻不能阻擋上面圖2的內容

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.hellomarket.com/search?q=%EC%94%BD%ED%81%AC%ED%8C%A8%EB%93%9C+%EB%85%B8%ED%8A%B8%EB%B6%81](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.hellomarket.com%2Fsearch%3Fq%3D%25EC%2594%25BD%25ED%2581%25AC%25ED%258C%25A8%25EB%2593%259C%2B%25EB%2585%25B8%25ED%258A%25B8%25EB%25B6%2581) ### Comment Username: @bokkwonsu > 헬로마켓 웹사이트에서 상품 검색이 왜 안되는지 그 이유를 찾았습니다. > > 구글 크롬 브라우저에 'AdGuard'라는 광고 차단 확정프로그램을 설치하여 사용하는데 광고 차단을 활성화하면 상품 검색 시에 결과가 노출되지 않고, 광고 차단을 비활성화하면 상품 검색 시에 결과가 노출됩니다. > > 'AdGuard'라는 광고 차단 확정프로그램을 설치하셔서 다시한번 재확인 부탁드리고, 광고가 아닌 상품 검색결과가 차단되는 것은 필터 문제인거 같아 'AdGuard' 측에 필터 수정을 요청하셔야 될거 같습니다 > > https://adguard.com/ko/ ### Screenshots

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

issue.title: Cannot primary click on any links on canyon.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

AdGuard Annoyances filter 2.1.31.24

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly, Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://canyon.com

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

**To reproduce:**
1. Clear cache if previously visited canyon.com.
2. Browse canyon.com with AdGuard Annoyances filter enabled.
3. Try to click on any links with primary click (middle click to open new tab works fine).
4. Should not be able to navigate to any links.

**Workaround:**
1. Disable AdGuard Annoyances filter.
2. Browse canyon.com.
3. Should now be able to see a cookie dialog overlay.
4. Accept cookie dialog.
5. Re-enable AdGuard Annoyances filter.
6. Browse canyon.com.
7. Should now be able to navigate to links with primary click, regardless if AdGuard Annoyances filter is enabled or not.

There seems to be some leftover invisible overlay that does not allow links to be clicked with the primary mouse button if the cookie dialog has not been accepted.

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: Fixed, filters update should be available in 1-2 hours.

labels.name: Extra

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

comment.body:
> I am on macOS Ventura beta. I disabled every single under General, Filters, Stealth Mode, Security, Assistant, and Extensions within AdGuard trying to isolate the issue and none of that fixed it. The ONLY thing that I disabled that would fix the problem is if I disabled "Automatically filter applications." And the problem with playing YouTube video is exclusive to the YOuTube website. Any video that is embedded on another site plays without a single problem.

I think this is caused by `YouTube Auto Buffer & Auto HD`. I have the same issue with some videos when I use a similar Chrome extension.

issue.body:
This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

### Внимание

Эта проблема решается с помощью расширения [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках программы.

Если вы используете браузерное расширение AdGuard, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

* [Установить в Chrome, Edge или другой браузер на основе Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

v3.6.8 (46-1.9.62cl)

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://app.adjust.com/96cf8hy?deep_link=ru.avito://1/main

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Russian filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <Comment> В приложении Авито не все фотографии отображаются в объявлениях
При постановке защиты adguard на паузу - все фотографии отображаются

Uid: 10284

Версия: 129.0 (1789)

Время установки: 30.03.2021 22:33
Время последнего обновления: 10.06.2022 23:41

2. Screenshots

![Screenshot_2022-06-21-08-11-10-505_com avito android](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/17904326/174720914-fd1cf454-8be5-4354-9c6b-410c8e228a8e.jpg)

Not necessary to enable them (you have `AdGuard Annoyances`), but if you want to use only them, turn off `AdGuard Annoyances`.

pull_request.title: Added some tracking parameters
pull_request.body:
# Creating the pull request


## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [x] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

Adds some URL tracking parameters. Namely:
- s_cid
-  __hsfp
- __hssc
- __hstc
- _hsenc
- hsCtaTracking
- __s
- mc_eid
- vero_conv
- vero_id
- wickedid

This list is inspired by [privacytests.org](https://privacytests.org)
### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [x] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [ ] Filters maintenance.

### Terms

- [x] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met
